abstract: Coverage of the execution of the Georgia inmate Troy Davis and the Occupy Wall Street protests has drawn attention to Democracy Now!, a 15-year-old nonprofit newscast; program, broadcast on more than 950 stations, distinguishes itself by documenting social movements, struggles for justice and effects of American foreign policy.
snippet: Coverage of the execution of the Georgia inmate Troy Davis and the Occupy Wall Street protests has drawn attention to “Democracy Now!,” a 15-year-old nonprofit newscast.
lead_paragraph: Coverage of the execution of the Georgia inmate Troy Davis and the Occupy Wall Street protests has drawn attention to “Democracy Now!,” a 15-year-old nonprofit newscast.

headline.main: A Grass-Roots Newscast Gives a Voice to Struggles
